titles.title: Nihon Manga Eiga Hattatsushi: Manga Eiga Tanjou
The Story and Development of Japanese Animated Cartoons
日本漫画映画発達史・漫画映画誕生

relatedanime.anime: Nihon Manga Eiga Hattatsushi: Anime Shingajou

anime.description: Black and white feature film about the birth and history of animation.

tag.name: CAST MISSING
tag.description: Important characters are missing, either in-part or entirely. This includes basic entry info (name, gender, picture), appear episode range, seiyuu and/or tags.
